original_text: Peter followed Jesus into the yard of Caiaphas's house. But he did not go near Jesus. He sat down in the yard with the guards and he made himself warm by the fire.
korean_text: 베드로가 예수를 멀찍이 따라 대제사장의 집 뜰 안까지 들어가서 아랫사람들과 함께 앉아 불을 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: into the yard of Caiaphas's house
But he did not go near Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 예수 가까이 가지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: He sat down in the yard
and he made himself warm by the fire
